body: I am interested in corresponding panels I've designed to certain radiation values on the grid. However, the panels are not square. Is it possible to define the grid using two dimensions instead of one?
topic: Is it possible to have a rectangular grid?

replies.body:
Hi Yeliz,

Ladybug default meshing is not capable of doing that however you can mesh it yourself as you want (based on your panels) and use the mesh instead of brep for input. In case you pass a mesh Ladybug will use the mesh to generate the test points without any change. Does it make sense?

Mostapha
